"react-redux"; -import { RootState } from "../store"; export default function BarberSelection() { - const barbers = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.barbers); + const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = React.useState(''); + const [selectedCounty, setSelectedCounty] = React.useState(''); + const [selectedLocation, setSelectedLocation] = React.useState(''); + const [sortBy, setSortBy] = React.useState('rating'); + const [viewMode, setViewMode] = React.useState('grid'); + const barbers = [ + { + id: 1, + name: "John Smith", + specialty: "Fade & Beard", + rating: 4.8, + location: "Nairobi CBD", + county: "Nairobi", + shopName: "Elite Barbershop", + available: true, + experience: "8 years", + image: Shave"], + reviews: 120 + }, + { + id: 2, + name: "Mike Jones", + specialty: "Classic Cuts", + rating: 4.6, + location: "Westlands", + county: "Nairobi", + shopName: "Westlands Grooming", + available: true, + experience: "6 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 1,200-2,000", + phone: "+254 700 234 567", + services: ["Haircut", "Hair Styling", "Scalp Treatment"], + reviews: 89 + }, + { + id: 3, + name: "Sarah Wilson", + specialty: "Hair Styling", + rating: 4.9, + location: "Karen", + county: "Nairobi", + shopName: "Karen Hair Studio", + available: false, + experience: "10 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 2,000-3,500", + phone: "+254 700 345 678", + services: ["Hair Styling", "Hair Coloring", "Hair Treatment"], + reviews: 156 + }, + { + id: 4, + name: "Carlos Rodriguez", + specialty: "Beard Grooming", + rating: 4.7, + location: "Kiambu Town", + county: "Kiambu", + shopName: "Kiambu Barbers", + available: true, + experience: "5 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 800-1,500", + phone: "+254 700 456 789", + services: ["Beard Trim", "Haircut", "Mustache Styling"], + reviews: 67 + }, + { + id: 5, + name: "James Mwangi", + specialty: "Traditional Cuts", + rating: 4.5, + location: "Thika", + county: "Kiambu", + shopName: "Thika Classic Barbers", + available: true, + experience: "7 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506794778202-cad84cf45f1d?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 600-1,200", + phone: "+254 700 567 890", + services: ["Haircut", "Beard Trim", "Hair Wash"], + reviews: 45 + }, + { + id: 6, + name: "Grace Wanjiku", + specialty: "Ladies Hair", + rating: 4.8, + location: "Runda", + county: "Nairobi", + shopName: "Runda Hair Salon", + available: true, + experience: "9 years", + image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580618672591-eb180b1a973f?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face", + price: "KSh 1,800-3,000", + phone: "+254 700 678 901", + services: ["Hair Styling", "Hair Coloring", "Hair Treatment", "Scalp Massage"], + reviews: 98 + } + ]; + + const counties = ['Nairobi', 'Kiambu']; + const nairobiLocations = ['Nairobi CBD', 'Westlands', 'Karen', 'Runda', 'Kileleshwa', 'Kilimani']; + const kiambuLocations = ['Kiambu Town', 'Thika', 'Ruiru', 'Kikuyu', 'Limuru']; + + const [filteredBarbers, setFilteredBarbers] = React.useState(barbers); + + React.useEffect(() => { + let filtered = barbers; + + if (searchTerm) { + filtered = filtered.filter(barber => + barber.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || + barber.specialty.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || + barber.shopName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) + ); + } + + if (selectedCounty) { + filtered = filtered.filter(barber => barber.county === selectedCounty); + } + + if (selectedLocation) { + filtered = filtered.filter(barber => barber.location === selectedLocation); + } + + // Sort barbers + filtered.sort((a, b) => { + switch (sortBy) { + case 'rating': + return b.rating - a.rating; + case 'price-low': + return parseInt(a.price.split('-')[0].replace('KSh ', '').replace(',', '')) - parseInt(b.price.split('-')[0].replace('KSh ', '').replace(',', '')); + case 'price-high': + return parseInt(b.price.split('-')[0].replace('KSh ', '').replace(',', '')) - parseInt(a.price.split('-')[0].replace('KSh ', '').replace(',', '')); + case 'experience': + return parseInt(b.experience) - parseInt(a.experience); + default: + return 0; + } + }); + + setFilteredBarbers(filtered); + }, [searchTerm, selectedCounty, selectedLocation, sortBy]); + return ( -
